Pre-Game Insights: The Kings are 9-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
The Heat are 9-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
The Kings are shooting 47.7% from the field this season, 1.2 percentage points higher than the 46.5% the Heat allow to opponents.
